message:
【 雨的故事 Rain Stories 】


《 雨 · 滴 》
春雨初降，第一滴雨水轻轻撞击土地，变幻了形状。
质朴中散发着平静和安宁，就像一个人的思考，总是新事物来临的征兆。

" Rain Drop "
Represents the beginning of rainfall with the first rain drop hittingthe ground and distorting.
Has a calm and peaceful feeling with itssimplicity.
Represents personal reflection and is an indicator ofthings to come.


《 雨 · 落 》
第一滴雨水的降落带来了一场小雨。
三种大小不同的雨滴就像徐徐落下的雨幕，初看，这雨幕似乎是静止不动的，但细细观察，雨滴交相辉映，绵延不绝，意蕴无穷。

" Light Rain "
After the first rain drop in the series comes light rain.
Represented here by three drops of varying size, at first glance look static and upon futher viewing these figures reflect off of each other creating an infinite feeling of continuous rainfall.


《 雨 · 倾 》
最为激烈的大雨倾盆而下。
无规则地组合，彼此相互反射，积少成多的力量就像暴雨一样顷刻喷发。

" Heavy Downpour "
The most turbulent of the sculpture series.
This is a multitude of drops in a random pattern, each reflecting off of each other amplifying the effect.


《 雨 · 汇 》
雨后，水滴重新汇聚，组合成一条游动的鱼。
犹如凤凰浴火涅槃，从激烈的暴雨中冲出的鱼赞颂着生命的执着，展开新的篇章。

" Rain Fish "
Finally, the rain drop series comes back to order in the shape of a fish with a fluid like appearance.
it has a similar story of the phoenix coming from a turbulent fire hut rather a fish appearing after a turbulent rainstorm and continuing the emergence of life.
title: 💧　雨的故事 Rain Stories　🌈
